title: Comparative Analysis of Instructional Design and Learning Design: Advanced Simulation/VR-Based Courses

context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training course for current practitioners, emphasizing experiential learning through VR simulations in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Compare major research trends in instructional design and learning design using bibliometric analysis tools
Derive and interpret core themes (e.g., theory-driven approaches, learner experience design) of the two fields using text mining techniques
Compare and evaluate practical applications of instructional design and learning design in VR simulation environments

resources: Instructional Design Template for Case Analysis

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
